Package dev.schoolmanagement.service.concrete

Class StudentServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
dev.schoolmanagement.service.concrete.StudentServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
BaseService<StudentDTO>, StudentService
@Service @Transactional(readOnly=true) public class StudentServiceImpl extends Object implements StudentService
StudenService implementation class. All of its methods are declared readOnly at class level, writing methods are excluded by @Transactional annotation.
Author:
Erhan Cavdar.

      @Transactional public StudentDTO update​(StudentDTO student)
      Description copied from interface: BaseService
      Update operation on a persistent entity. First checks if there is a entity associated, if not throws EntityNotFoundException .

    • enrollCourse

      @Transactional public StudentDTO enrollCourse​(Long studentId, Long courseId)
      Gets the associated entities from database by using their ID's, then sets the found Course entities students field by using its CourseDTO.addStudents(Student) method. After that persist the updated Course object back. If one of the give ID's fail to match a entry at database level, throws EntityNotFoundException.
      Specified by:
      enrollCourse in interface StudentService
      Parameters:
      studentId - of the enrolled student.
      courseId - of the target course.
      Returns:
      the updated data.
